Index.description: Create words using letters from the hive and try to get the maximum score.
Index.atLeastFourLetters: Words must have at least four letters
Index.centerLetter: Words must include the center letter
Index.moreThanOnce: Letters can be used more than once
Index.hypens: Words with hyphens, proper nouns, vulgarities, and especially obscure words are not in the word list
Index.scorePoints: Score points to increase your rating. 4-letter words are worth 1 point
Index.longerWords: Longer words earn 1 point per letter
Index.pangram: Each puzzle includes at least one “pangram” which uses every letter. These are worth 7 extra points!
Index.timeUp: Time is up! Your score is
